fixes.name: BATCH
fixes.dax_expression:
VAR UseCustom = SELECTEDVALUE('Use Custom Date'[Display As])
VAR EndDate = SELECTEDVALUE('End Date'[Display As])
RETURN
IF(
    UseCustom,
    IF(
        'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Max Date Exclude] = 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[EFFECTIVE_DATE],
        'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[DELTA_10],
        0
    ),
    IF(
        'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[EFFECTIVE_DATE] = EndDate,
        'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[DELTA_10],
        0
    )
)
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted the Tableau nested IF to a DAX measure using VARs. Parameter references were replaced with SELECTEDVALUE('Use Custom Date'[Display As]) and SELECTEDVALUE('End Date'[Display As]). All field references were mapped to the table format 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[ColumnName], preserving the original conditional logic.
fixes.type_changed_reason: The calculation references parameters ([Use Custom Date], [End Date]); any formula referencing parameters must be created as a measure.
